subtests.name: A transceiver added and stopped before the initial offer generation should not trigger an offer m-section generation
During renegotiation, adding and stopping a transceiver should not trigger a renegotiated offer m-section generation
A stopped sendonly transceiver should generate a sendonly m-section in the offer
A stopped inactive transceiver should generate an inactive m-section in the offer
If a track is stopped locally, setting a locally generated answer should still work
If a track is stopped remotely, setting a locally generated answer should still work
